Web Hosting @ Veeble Hosting - starting at $1.5/mo
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


cPanel Web Hosting Features



Starting at $1.5 per month(when paid monthly) or $0.95 per month(when paid annually)
Unlimited Databases, Unlimited Email accounts, Unlimited FTP and Subdomains
9x Faster Hosting using Litespeed Web server
Dedicated Resource allocation using Cloudlinux
Softaculous Installer having 347 great scripts, 1115 PHP Classes and installation in a click.
Instant setup in 10 seconds
US/EU located servers
RAID-10 Protected Enterprise grade HDD
Free Remote Backups and Restoration
Premium mail relay to avoid mails going to spambox



Order hosting here https://www.veeble.org/hosting/web-hosting

Enter promo code DOWN50 at checkout to get flat 50% OFF on monthly billing.

Enter promo code DOWN30 at checkout to get flat 30% OFF on annual billing.
